Name: Effie
Description: "When played, Heal all Damaged Allies by +1"

Name: Morag
Description: "When Played Empower 1 Ally to the left (+1/+1)"

Name: Gregor
Description: "When Played, Cleanse 1 Ally to the right"

Name: Matthew
Description: "When summoned Weaken an Enemy Attacker by -2 Damage."

Name: Lachlan
Description: "When Destroyed replace with a 2/2 Changeling"

Name: Arvil
Description: "When Destroyed summon Carwen in Hand"

Description: "When Destroyed summon Arvil in Hand"

Name: Bealin’ Donald
Description: "When played, the zone directly across deals -2 Damage, and zones adjacent to it deal -1 Damage"

Name: The Eachy
Description: "On attack, decrease the attacked cards attack by 1"

Name: Blue Men of the Minch
Description: "When played, summons 2 Blue Men with 1HP and 1 Damage, if there are free zones"

Name: The Ceasg
Description: "When played, gives up to three Allies +1HP"

Name: The Cu-Sith
Description: "Howls at the end of the player’s turn, reducing the HP and Damage of any enemy units that attacked. "

Name: Phantom Piper
Description: "When played,  turns one enemy unit to the player’s side"

Name: Water Healing
Description: "Heal 1 Ally to the right for +1HP"

Name: Water Bubble
Description: "Enemy Unit infront Cannot Attack this Turn"

Name: Tidal Wave
Description: "Deal 2 Damage to all Enemy Units. Heal all your Units by +2HP"

Name: Take Aim
Description: "Deals 2 Direct Damage to the player"

Name: Targe
Description: "Strengthen Ally on each side by +2HP"

Name: Perfect Date
Description: "Protects 1 Ally to the right from taking Damage for one turn"

Name: Conservation
Description: "Prevents 1 Ally to the left from taking Damage for one turn"

Name: Otter
Description: "Heal 1 Ally to the right for +1HP or, if the Boobrie is active, heal it for +2HP"
